name: Seaing Red
description:
Seaing Red [sic] is a tiny storytelling game where you depict yourself as a Jewish refugee escaping Egypt through the parted Red Sea. 

Designed to be completed in about 15-20 minutes, it is intended as a solo game, but can be easily modified to include up to 4 players, and only requires a standard deck of cards. 

Made as part of #matzojam 2021.
